description: Scour away dirt and grime with the As Seen on TV Turbo Scrub. This powerful tool rotates up to 300 times per minute to erase hard water stains, calcium, lime, rust and buildup in your bathroom or kitchen, making cleaning fast and easy. Cordless and rechargeable, the Turbo Scrub is lightweight and extends up to four feet, so you can clean messes from floor to ceiling with ease. The Turbo Scrub comes with three head attachments; the all-purpose brush, heavy duty brush, and corner brush are great for cleaning tile grout, polishing your floors, removing soap scum from shower doors and more.
title: As Seen on TV® Housecleaning Tool And Accessory Set - White

bullets: Comes with 3 brush attachments, extension rod and AC power adapter
Powerful rotating head does all the heavy-duty scrubbing for you
Perfect for people with arthritis or difficulty bending

description: Make dishwashing simple with this Full Circle Suds Up Soap-Dispensing Brush. Made with a bamboo handle and recycled plastic bristles, this convenient scrub brush will give your dishes that extra sparkle you always want. The easy-to-use brush has tough bristles that effortlessly tackle grease and grime, and the head is replaceable so you can easily keep the brush clean. Simply fill the handle with your favorite dishwashing liquid and have plenty of fresh suds as you wash your dishes.
title: Full Circle Suds Up Soap Dispensing Brush, Green
